description: Supreme AI configuration for a 10X software developer. Manages models, tasks, and integrations for the 'allegretto' project.

projectContext.description: This context is injected into prompts to provide the AI with crucial information about the project's technical environment.
projectContext.developmentEnvironment: Developed on Ubuntu WSL, Node.js LTS, Docker.

globalSettings.description: Default settings applied to all tasks unless overridden by a specific profile.

platformIntegrations.description: Configuration for integrating with external platforms like Google Cloud.

modelProfiles.description: Specific model configurations tailored for different types of tasks, using the latest generation of stable models.

default-pro.description: The most powerful and balanced profile for complex reasoning and generation.

fast-and-efficient.description: The quickest and most cost-effective profile for simple, high-frequency tasks.

code-master.description: High-precision profile for generating production-quality, deterministic code. Uses the most powerful model with a very low temperature.

creative-architect.description: Profile for brainstorming, architectural design, and exploring multiple solutions. Higher temperature for creativity.

test-generator.description: Optimized for generating accurate and thorough tests using a powerful model.

commit-message-crafter.description: Lightweight profile for generating concise and conventional commit messages.

memory-synthesizer.description: Specialized profile for summarizing conversations and synthesizing information for long-term memory.

text-embedding.description: Specialized model for creating vector embeddings for RAG or semantic search.

taskMappings.description: Maps specific development tasks to the most appropriate model profile.

persistent-context-server.description: Unico MCP server para gestionar la memoria a corto y largo plazo, el contexto del proyecto y el historial de Git.

tools.name: save_session_summary
tools.description: Guarda un resumen de la sesión actual en la memoria a largo plazo.

text.description: El texto del resumen a guardar.

tools.name: get_last_session_summary
tools.description: Recupera el resumen de la sesión más reciente de la memoria a largo plazo.
